RT @ValaAfshar: Easy work:
1 blaming
2 judging
3 imitating
4 pretending
5 waiting

Hard work:
1 learning
2 teaching
3 inspiring
4 improving‚Ä¶
Best question ever! "What makes you say that?" #wmyst #VisibleThinking
Unstructured time allows for children to be more self-directed and make decisions about how to use their time. #VisibleThinking
Don't ask "What did you do in school today?" Instead ask, "Did you ask any good questions today?" #encouragethinking
WHO is doing the thinking? Is it you? Or the child? #VisibleThinking
Ss continuously praised for ability are likely to engage in ego-protection- praised for effort, they will be inclined 2 take on challenges.
When you praise for ability, you are praising the ego. When you praise for effort, you praise for rising to the challenge. #tsdthinkers
